languages.text: Когда одно из убеждений достигает ранга III поборник, оно становится основным направлением для развития персонажа. После этого оставшиеся два типа убеждений не могут подняться выше ранга II сторонник.
languages.original_text: When one of the conviction branches reaches rank III: Votary, it becomes the character's main focus. When that happens, the other two conviction branches cannot be raised above rank II: Adherent.

languages.text: When one of the conviction branches reaches rank III: Votary, it becomes the character's main focus. When that happens, the other two conviction branches cannot be raised above rank II: Adherent.

traits.locale_text: When one of the conviction branches reaches rank III: Votary, it becomes the character's main focus. When that happens, the other two conviction branches cannot be raised above the rank II Adherent.
When one of the conviction branches reaches rank III: Votary, it becomes the character's main focus. When that happens, the other two conviction branches cannot be raised above rank II: Adherent.
When one of the conviction branches reaches rank III: Votary, it becomes the character's main focus. When that happens, the other two conviction branches cannot be raised above rank II: Adherent.

languages.text: Wenn einer der Überzeugungszweige Rang III (Geweihter) erreicht, wird er zum Hauptfokus des Charakters. Wenn das passiert, können die anderen beiden Überzeugungszweige nicht über Rang II (Anhänger) gesteigert werden.
languages.original_text: When one of the conviction branches reaches rank III: Votary, it becomes the character's main focus. When that happens, the other two conviction branches cannot be raised above rank II: Adherent.

traits.locale_text: Wenn einer der Überzeugungszweige Rang III (Geweihter) erreicht, wird er zum Hauptfokus des Charakters. Wenn das passiert, können die anderen beiden Überzeugungszweige nicht über Rang II (Anhänger) gesteigert werden.

languages.text: Lorsque l'une des branches de conviction atteint le rang III : Disciple, elle devient la priorité du personnage. Lorsque cela se produit, les deux autres branches de conviction ne peuvent plus dépasser le rang II : Adhérent.
languages.original_text: When one of the conviction branches reaches rank III: Votary, it becomes the character's main focus. When that happens, the other two conviction branches cannot be raised above rank II: Adherent.

traits.locale_text: Lorsque l'une des branches de conviction atteint le rang III : Disciple, elle devient la priorité du personnage. Lorsque cela se produit, les deux autres branches de conviction ne peuvent plus dépasser le rang II : Adhérent.

languages.text: 当角色的某项信念到达第三级：信奉者时，该信念便会成为该角色的主要信念。当人物拥有主要信念之后，其余两条信念分支最多便只能提升至第二级：拥护者，无法继续提升。
languages.original_text: When one of the conviction branches reaches rank III: Votary, it becomes the character's main focus. When that happens, the other two conviction branches cannot be raised above rank II: Adherent.

traits.locale_text: 当角色的某项信念到达第三级：信奉者时，该信念便会成为该角色的主要信念。当人物拥有主要信念之后，其余两条信念分支最多便只能提升至第二级：拥护者，无法继续提升。

languages.text: Cuando una de las convicciones alcanza el rango III: Devoto, se convierte en el enfoque central del personaje. Cuando sucede, las otras dos convicciones no podrán subir del rango II: Partidario.
languages.original_text: When one of the conviction branches reaches rank III: Votary, it becomes the character's main focus. When that happens, the other two conviction branches cannot be raised above rank II: Adherent.

traits.locale_text: Cuando una de las convicciones alcanza el rango III: Devoto, se convierte en el enfoque central del personaje. Cuando sucede, las otras dos convicciones no podrán subir del rango II: Partidario.

languages.text: 信念の分岐のひとつがランク3の弟子になると、それがキャラクターの主軸になる。その場合、他のふたつの信念の分岐は、ランク2の門下生より上になることはなくなる。
languages.original_text: When one of the conviction branches reaches rank III: Votary, it becomes the character's main focus. When that happens, the other two conviction branches cannot be raised above rank II: Adherent.

traits.locale_text: 信念の分岐のひとつがランク3の弟子になると、それがキャラクターの主軸になる。その場合、他のふたつの信念の分岐は、ランク2の門下生より上になることはなくなる。

languages.text: Kanaat dallarından bir tanesi III. kademe olan Ateşli'ye ulaştığında o kanaat, karakterinin ana odağı hâline gelir. Bu olduğunda diğer iki kanaat dalı, II. kademe olan Taraftar'ın üstüne çıkamaz.
languages.original_text: When one of the conviction branches reaches rank III: Votary, it becomes the character's main focus. When that happens, the other two conviction branches cannot be raised above rank II: Adherent.
